data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: One of the essential safety regulations in the construction industry is that a safety helmet must be worn at a construction site if there is a risk of being struck on the head. This regulation is effective in eliminating risks for people working in the construction industry. It is the employer's responsibility to keep the safety of each employee.（59 字）
data.referenceText: Give examples of important worker safety regulations in occupations such as transportation, factory work or construction.
data.referenceTranslate: 举例说明运输、工厂工作或建筑等职业中重要的工人安全规定。
